history.proof: intros H. pose (f i Hi := proj1_sig (H i Hi)). pose (g i Hi := proj2_sig (H i Hi)). exists f. intros i Hi. qsimpl time: 1.

ctx: pose (f i Hi := proj1_sig (H i Hi)).
pose (g i Hi := proj2_sig (H i Hi)).
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat H : forall i : nat, i < k -> {x : X | Q i x} f := fun (i : nat) (Hi : i < k) => proj1_sig (H i Hi) : forall i : nat, i < k -> X g := fun (i : nat) (Hi : i < k) => proj2_sig (H i Hi) : forall (i : nat) (Hi : i < k), Q i (proj1_sig (H i Hi)) i : nat Hi : i < k Unable to unify "?P (ssrfun.s2val ?M1386)" with "Q i (f i Hi)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
Q: nat -> X -> Prop
k: nat

Goal:
(forall i : nat, i < k -> {x : X | Q i x}) -> {f : forall i : nat, i < k -> X | forall (i : nat) (Hi : i < k), Q i (f i Hi)}

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Fin.to_nat_of_nat : forall h : ?p < ?n, Fin.to_nat (Fin.of_nat_lt h) = exist (fun i : nat => i < ?n) ?p h where ?p : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- nat] ?n : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- nat]
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : Fin.t m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (Fin.t n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, Fin.t m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
ssrfun.sig_of_sig2 : forall (I : Type) (P Q : I -> Prop), {x : I | P x & Q x} -> {i : I | P i /\ Q i}
VectorDef.nth_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?n : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- nat]
VectorDef.replace_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?n : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- nat]
ssrfun.s2valP' : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x}, ?Q (ssrfun.s2val u) where ?T : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?T -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?T -> Prop]
ssrfun.s2valP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x}, ?P (ssrfun.s2val u) where ?T : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?T -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?T -> Prop]
ssrfun.svalP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x}, ?P (proj1_sig u) where ?T : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?T -> Prop]
dependent_choice : forall (X : Set) (R : X -> X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {y : X | R x y}) -> forall x0 : X, {f : nat -> X | f 0 = x0 /\ (forall n : nat, R (f n) (f (S n)))}
exists_to_inhabited_sig : (exists x : ?A, ?P x) -> inhabited {x : ?A | ?P x} where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]
inhabited_sig_to_exists : inhabited {x : ?A | ?P x} -> exists x : ?A, ?P x where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]
proj2_sig_eq : forall p : ?u = ?v, eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) (proj1_sig_eq p) = proj2_sig ?v where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
ssrfun.Tagged : forall T_ : ?I -> Type, T_ ?i -> {x0 : ?I & T_ x0} where ?I : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?i : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?I]
eq_sig2_hprop : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?Q x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, sig_of_sig2 u = sig_of_sig2 v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig2_hprop_iff : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?Q x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, u = v < -> sig_of_sig2 u = sig_of_sig2 v where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig_rect : forall Q0 : ?u = ?v -> Type, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q0 (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q0 p where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_ind : forall Q0 : ?u = ?v -> Prop, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q0 (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q0 p where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_rec : forall Q0 : ?u = ?v -> Set, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q0 (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q0 p where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_hprop : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?P x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]
sig_eta : forall p : {a : ?A | ?P a}, p = exist (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj1_sig p) (proj2_sig p) where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig_hprop_iff : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?P x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, u = v < -> proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig_uncurried : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, {p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v | eq_rect (proj1_sig u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig u) (proj1_sig v) p = proj2_sig v} -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig : forall (u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}) (p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v), eq_rect (proj1_sig u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig u) (proj1_sig v) p = proj2_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig_uncurried_iff : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, u = v < -> {p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v | eq_rect (proj1_sig u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig u) (proj1_sig v) p = proj2_sig v} where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig2 : forall (u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}) (p : proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)), eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) -> eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p = proj3_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat |- ?A -> Prop]

```coq
intros H.
pose (f i Hi := proj1_sig (H i Hi)).
pose (g i Hi := proj2_sig (H i Hi)).
exists f.
intros i Hi.
apply ssrfun.s2valP.
Qed.
